name: Name
materials_description: VE-Collab offers a growing range of interactive self-learning materials on topics related to virtual exchanges, e.g. potentials or challenges.
materials_welcome: Welcome to the constantly growing collection of learning material of VE-Collab!
materials_intro_text: You are interested in virtual exchanges but have little or no prior knowledge on the topic? The learning materials will help you dive into the subject and support you step by step on your way to your first virtual exchange. Have you already gained experience with virtual exchanges? Here you can deepen your knowledge in the relevant topics, reflect on your previous experiences, and get inspired by current links and articles for your own practice and research.
materials_only_german: Unfortunately the learning material is only available in German at the moment. You can try to use your browsers translation tool.

homepage_text: VE-Collab supports educators with a variety of qualification offers in building their own competencies and provides assistance in the initiation, planning, and implementation of international and national virtual exchanges. By building a Community of Practice, we also promote active collegial (virtual) exchange.

frontpage.description: VE-Collab supports teachers with a wide range of qualification offers and provides assistance in planning and implementing virtual exchanges.

slide1.title: We get you ready for virtual exchanges
slide1.text: Do you want to make your teaching more cooperative, digital and international? VE-Collab offers you a wide range of qualification options and provides assistance with the initialization, planning and implementation of international and national virtual exchanges.

slide2.title: Find suitable partners and network
slide2.text: Find VE partners in our virtual Community of Practice, share good practice examples and network internationally.

slide3.title: Step-by-step planning assistance
slide3.text: Our “VE Designer” offers novices an easy introduction to VE planning and experts an individually customizable form for co-creative planning of joint virtual exchanges.

slide4.title: Added value for institutions
slide4.text: VEs are a low-threshold offer to increase the internationalization of teaching and the digital literacy of teachers and students. VE-Collab offers a platform which lets you spread the word about VE at your university, qualify teachers and support VE in the long term. Build skills and tackle obstacles - strengthen internationalization at your institution.

slide5.title: Added value for teachers
slide5.text: With VEs you and your students can network internationally and bring the world into your events. VE-Collab helps you to familiarize yourself with VE through short self-study units, to acquire important basics for carrying out VE, and supports you in your curriculum planning. You can also use VE-Collab to network and exchange information about VE in a global community.

frontpage.logo_uni_leipzig: Logo of the University of Leipzig

learning_material.title: Learning materials
learning_material.text: Constantly growing offer of interactive training materials as OER

vcop.title: Virtual Community of Practice
vcop.text: Find VE partners, share good practice examples, network (internationally).

value1.title: Build skills - tackle obstacles
value1.text: Support your teachers and employees in initiating and carrying out virtual exchanges with VE-Collab's qualification and support features.

value2.title: Strengthen internationalization and digital literacy
value2.text: Strengthen the internationalization of studies and the digital literacy of teachers and students through virtual exchanges by anchoring VE-Collab in your institution.

value1.title: Qualification
value1.text: Educate yourself flexibly with VE-Collab's self-study materials and take your own teaching to a new level.

value2.title: Support
value2.text: Our VE-Designer supports you step-by-step in planning and organizing your virtual exchange; additionally, you can get more help in the community.

value3.title: Networking
value3.text: VE-Collab lets you easily establish new (international) contacts for conducting virtual exchanges.

about-ve-designer.title: VE planning tool "VE-Designer"
text: Tool that guides VE partners step by step through the planning process of a VE
Additional assistance on almost all aspects of planning, e.g. by refernces to the learning material
Opportunity to share developed and implemented VE plans as good practice examples with the community
Possibility to importing content from other good practice examples into your own plans
exclusively available for registered users only

about-vcop.title: Virtual Community of Practice
text: Create a profile, join groups (or start one yourself), post status updates, share interesting things or ask questions...
VE-specific profile information as a basis for the partner matching
Personal vitrine for current and past VE projects
exclusively available for registered users only

learning_materials_descriptions.learning-material/1/Einf%C3%BChrung/Was%: A rough overview and introductory video of the “virtual exchange” (VA) teaching concept.
learning_materials_descriptions.learning-material/1/Einf%C3%BChrung/Merk: the characteristic features of a VE: digital, geographically separated, learners work collaboratively and are supported by teachers.
learning_materials_descriptions.learning-material/1/Einf%C3%BChrung/Begr: Many terms are used synonymously with VEs, e.g. telecollaboration, COIL, etc., but others, such as MOOC or online meetings are different concepts.
learning_materials_descriptions.learning-material/1/Einf%C3%BChrung/Zusa: A short summary of the previous chapters on the definition of VE, characteristic features and a definition of terms.
learning_materials_descriptions.learning-material/1/Potenziale/Einstieg: An interactive teaching module on the potential of VE.
learning_materials_descriptions.learning-material/1/Potenziale/Mehrwerte: An interactive teaching module on the added value of VEs, e.g. technical, linguistic, digital and cultural competence building and internationalization.
learning_materials_descriptions.learning-material/1/Potenziale/Kompetenz: An interactive teaching module on competency models that underlie VEs, e.g. 4K model or 21st Century Skills
learning_materials_descriptions.learning-material/1/Herausforderungen/He: An interactive teaching module on the biggest challenges of VEs and how to solve them.
learning_materials_descriptions.learning-material/2/Evaluation/Einstieg: An interactive teaching module asking whether, why and how you should evaluate a VE.
learning_materials_descriptions.learning-material/2/Evaluation/Ziele%2C%: An interactive teaching module on forms of evaluation (formative or summative), evaluation priorities and dimensions of the evaluation of VEs.
learning_materials_descriptions.learning-material/2/Evaluation/Evaluatio: An interactive teaching module to introduce formal and informal evaluation methods and how to choose a suitable method.
learning_materials_descriptions.learning-material/2/Evaluation/Auswertun: An interactive teaching module for dealing with evaluation data, its evaluation and the correct handling of evaluation results.
learning_materials_descriptions.learning-material/3/Tools/Kontakt%20und%: Video conferencing tools such as Zoom, Jitsi, or BigBlueButton and management tools such as Zenkit, Leapchat, Nuudel, etc. are useful for contact and organization.
learning_materials_descriptions.learning-material/3/Tools/Kollaboratives: Whiteboards and writing tools such as Padlet, ConceptBoard, Notion, as well as survey and discussion tools are suitable for collaborative work in VEs.
learning_materials_descriptions.learning-material/3/Tools/Interaktive%20: VEs can be enriched with didactic and playful elements.
learning_materials_descriptions.learning-material/1: A collection of interactive teaching modules on general topics related to VEs - introduction, potential, challenges and practical examples.
learning_materials_descriptions.learning-material/2: A collection of interactive teaching modules for concrete planning of VEs and evaluation.
learning_materials_descriptions.learning-material/3: A collection of interactive teaching modules on useful tools for VEs, data protection issues, digital media and Open Educational Resources (OER).
learning_materials_descriptions.learning-material/4: A collection of interactive teaching modules on cultural & linguistic aspects, interaction and collaboration and a method kit for digital teaching.
